alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lexington County through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Red Bank, Pelion, Gilbert, Summit, Camp Kinard, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Fredonia, Murray, Barr Lake, Samaria Fire Station and Red Bank Sports Complex. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 39 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
